item.description:
Agenda

  • 07:00 - 07:30 Self Introduction, exchange business cards
  • 07:30 - 08:00 Internet marketing - affiliate marketing discussion
  • 08:00 - Discussion, networking


If you would like to present a case study, let me know ahead of time. I do want to make sure that the presentation is valid and good use of everyone's time.
item.how_to_find_us: This is a block away from Taven on the Square. We will be in the lower level. Finding parking on the street is pretty easy around there. It's in the same area of Taven on the Square. There are also two metered parking lots near by.
item.why: You will love it because you will learn and meet new friends.

group.name: The Boston Area Internet Marketing and Advertising Group

item.name: The Boston Area Internet Marketing and Advertising Group June Meeting
